name: apex-coach-ai
description: Apex Coach AI - The Unified AI Platform for Structured, Multimedia Coaching Programs

scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter web dev" "pnpm --filter indexer dev" "pnpm --filter search dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter web build && pnpm --filter indexer build && pnpm --filter search build
scripts.build:services: pnpm --filter indexer build && pnpm --filter search build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter web test && pnpm --filter indexer test && pnpm --filter search test
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter web lint && pnpm --filter indexer lint && pnpm --filter search lint
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter web clean && pnpm --filter indexer clean && pnpm --filter search clean
scripts.docker:build: pnpm docker:build:web && pnpm docker:build:indexer && pnpm docker:build:search
scripts.docker:build:web: cd apps/web && docker build -t apexcoachai-web -f Dockerfile ../..
scripts.docker:build:indexer: cd apps/services/indexer && docker build -t apexcoachai-indexer -f Dockerfile ../..
scripts.docker:build:search: cd apps/services/search && docker build -t apexcoachai-search -f Dockerfile ../..
